an10.64:1.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasanna, sabbe te sotapanna.
an10.64:1.2: Tesam sotapannanam pancannam idha nittha, pancannam idha vihaya nittha.
an10.64:1.4: Sattakkhattuparamassa, kolankolassa, ekabijissa, sakadagamissa, yo ca dittheva dhamme araha—
an10.64:1.7: Antaraparinibbayissa, upahaccaparinibbayissa, asankharaparinibbayissa, sasankharaparinibbayissa, uddhamsotassa akanitthagamino—
an10.64:1.9: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasanna sabbe te sotapanna.
an10.64:1.10: Tesam sotapannanam imesam pancannam idha nittha, imesam pancannam idha vihaya nittha”ti.
